remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定 類別的值，並假設 `results` 是先前在檔案中建立的 型別。The following code example demonstrates how to set the value of the class, and assumes that `results` is of type , which is created earlier in the file. 程式碼也會建立 和 類別的新執行個體，並設定一些值。The code also creates new instances of the and classes and sets some values. 這個程式碼範例是 WizardForm.cs 檔案中＜Outlook 工作流程精靈 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Outlook Workflow Wizard SDK Sample from the WizardForm.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Outlook 工作流程精靈](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b2ba92b-8456-43f3-87fc-184ffdec4408)。For more information, see [Outlook Workflow Wizard](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b2ba92b-8456-43f3-87fc-184ffdec4408).
